name: Puppies 3D
overview: Adopt your very own puppies, take care of them, play with them, exercise with them, train them, and socialize, all in an incredibly realistic and interactive three-dimensional environment. Puppies 3D will fully transport you to a puppy-loving town with interesting townsfolk to interact with. Features • Adopt and care for 12 popular breeds of dogs• Interact and train your virtual dogs as if they were real pets• Explore a village full of discovery with people and other dogs
